mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nvcampaign ( scenario_no, campaign_no, grp_cd, user_id, segment_no, campaign_nm, campaign_desc, campaign_preface, campaign_sts, create_dt , create_tm, campaign_type, template_type, target_cnt, sending_mode, log_yn, keepday, share_yn, retry_cnt, sender_nm , sender_email, receiver_nm, sender_tel, retmail_receiver, htmlupdate_yn, etc_info1, campaign_class, channel_type, etc_info2, retmail_send_yn , category_cd, promotion_type, campaign_level, relation_type, survey_end_yn, survey_no, survey_start_dt, survey_start_tm, survey_end_dt, survey_end_tm , req_dept_id, req_user_id, ab_test_type, campaign_preface_ab, ab_test_cond, ab_test_rate, divide_yn, divide_interval, divide_cnt, kakao_image_no ) SELECT #{newScenarioNo}, #{campaignVo.newCampaignNo}, #{grpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, segment_no, campaign_nm, campaign_desc, campaign_preface,'I', #{createDt, jdbcType=CHAR} , #{createTm, jdbcType=CHAR}, campaign_type, template_type, target_cnt, 'N', log_yn, keepday, share_yn, retry_cnt, sender_nm , sender_email, receiver_nm, sender_tel, retmail_receiver, htmlupdate_yn, etc_info1, 'A', channel_type, etc_info2, retmail_send_yn , category_cd, promotion_type, CASE WHEN campaign_level = '3' THEN '2' ELSE campaign_level END campaign_level, 'N', survey_end_yn , survey_no, survey_start_dt, survey_start_tm, survey_end_dt, survey_end_tm , req_dept_id, req_user_id, ab_test_type, campaign_preface_ab, ab_test_cond, ab_test_rate, divide_yn, divide_interval, divide_cnt, kakao_image_no FROM nvcampaign WHERE campaign_no = #{campaignVo.campaignNo}

INSERT INTO nvcampaign ( scenario_no, campaign_no, grp_cd, user_id, segment_no, target_cnt, campaign_nm, campaign_desc, campaign_preface, campaign_sts , create_dt, create_tm, campaign_type, template_type, sending_mode, log_yn, keepday, share_yn, retry_cnt, sender_nm , sender_email, receiver_nm, sender_tel, retmail_receiver, htmlupdate_yn, etc_info1, campaign_class, channel_type, etc_info2, retmail_send_yn , category_cd, promotion_type, campaign_level, relation_type, relation_tree, depth_no, survey_end_yn, survey_no, survey_start_dt, survey_start_tm , survey_end_dt, survey_end_tm, req_dept_id, req_user_id, divide_yn, ab_test_type) SELECT #{newScenarioNo}, #{campaignVo.newCampaignNo}, #{userVo.grpCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userVo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{segmentNo}, #{segmentSize}, campaign_nm, campaign_desc, #{campaignVo.campaignPreface, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'I' , #{createDt, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTm, jdbcType=CHAR}, campaign_type, template_type, 'N', log_yn, keepday, share_yn, retry_cnt, sender_nm , #{campaignVo.senderEmail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_nm, sender_tel, #{campaignVo.retmailReceiver, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, htmlupdate_yn, etc_info1, 'A', coalesce(#{campaignVo.channelType, jdbcType=CHAR}, channel_type), etc_info2, retmail_send_yn , category_cd, promotion_type, CASE WHEN campaign_level = '3' THEN '2' ELSE campaign_level END campaign_level, #{campaignVo.relationType, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{campaignVo.relationTree, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , coalesce(depth_no,1) + 1, survey_end_yn, survey_no, survey_start_dt, survey_start_tm , survey_end_dt, survey_end_tm, req_dept_id, req_user_id, 'N', 'N' FROM nvcampaign WHERE campaign_no = #{campaignVo.campaignNo}
mapper.select: SELECT coalesce(max(segment_no),0) FROM nvcampaign WHERE scenario_no = #{scenarioNo} AND depth_no = 1
SELECT coalesce(max(campaign_no),0) FROM nvcampaign WHERE campaign_sts IN ('E', 'W')

SELECT campaign_no, campaign_preface, channel_type, relation_type, depth_no , (CASE channel_type WHEN 'M' THEN 4 WHEN 'S' THEN 3 WHEN 'T' THEN 2 WHEN 'F' THEN 1 END) as seq FROM nvcampaign WHERE scenario_no = #{scenarioNo} ORDER BY seq DESC, depth_no
SELECT campaign_no, segment_no FROM nvcampaign WHERE scenario_no = #{scenarioNo} AND depth_no = 1

SELECT a.segment_no, a.campaign_nm as service_nm, a.user_id, a.campaign_class as service_class, a.channel_type, a.retmail_receiver, a.sender_nm , coalesce(a.sender_email,' ') sender_email, coalesce(a.sender_tel,' ') sender_tel, coalesce(a.receiver_nm,' ') receiver_nm , a.retry_cnt, a.campaign_type, a.sending_mode, a.sendstart_dt, a.sendstart_tm, '' as service_type, '' as sub_type , coalesce(a.survey_no,-1) survey_no, -1 as resend_ecare_no, a.campaign_preface, a.campaign_preface_ab, a.relation_type, a.depth_no, a.scenario_no , b.type as handler_type, b.appsource FROM nvcampaign a, nvapplication b WHERE a.campaign_no = b.campaign_no AND a.campaign_no = #{serviceNo}
